c74object.name: ta.velocity2dynamics
c74object.description: This object converts MIDI velocity values (0~127) to musical dynamics (ppp, pp, mp, mf, f, ff, fff)

outlet.description: Dynamics are: ppp, pp, p, mp, mf, f, ff, fff
0 = ppp, 1 = pp, 2 = p, 3 = mp, 4 = mf, 5 = f, 6 = ff, 7 = fff

method.name: int
method.description: Velocity values are converted to musical dynamics. (0 = ppp, 1 = pp, 2 = p, 3 = mp, 4 = mf, 5 = f, 6 = ff, 7 = fff)

example.caption: Converting between MIDI velocity values and musical dynamics

entry.name: int
entry.description:
Out left outlet: musical dynamics in symbol format ("ppp", "pp", "p", "mp", "mf", "f", "ff", "fff")
Out right outlet: musical dynamics in int format (0 = ppp, 1 = pp, 2 = p, 3 = mp, 4 = mf, 5 = f, 6 = ff, 7 = fff)
